create_user.subject: Account activation
create_user.title: Hello
create_user.content1: You have been invited to access the IOK Platform, where you can manage your menus and equipment.
create_user.content2: to complete your registration on the platform.
create_user.content5: If you have any questions, you can respond to this email or contact us at (35) 3449-1200, Monday through Friday during business hours.
reset_user.subject: Password Reset
reset_user.title: Hello
reset_user.content1: You recently requested a new access password for the IOK Platform.
reset_user.content2: If you have not requested such a change, please disregard this email.
reset_user.content6: If you have any questions, you can respond to this email or contact us at (35) 3449-1200, Monday through Friday during business hours.
